title: James Patterson: "The Stories Of My Life"
description: Michael talks with bestselling author James Patterson on his new autobiography, "James Patterson by James Patterson: The Stories of My Life." Original air date 21 June 2022. The book was published on 6 June 2022.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (James Patterson, Michael Smerconish)
